title: How to Put an iPod Into Disk Mode

steps.title: Before placing the iPod into disk mode, you should verify that it is charged.
steps.content: Before placing the iPod into disk mode, you should verify that it is charged.

steps.title: Toggle the Hold switch on and off.
steps.content: Toggle the Hold switch on and off. (Set it to Hold, then turn it off again.)

steps.title: Press and hold the Menu and Select buttons for at least 6 seconds until the Apple logo appears.
steps.content: Press and hold the Menu and Select buttons for at least 6 seconds until the Apple logo appears.

steps.title: When the Apple logo appears, release the Menu and Select buttons and immediately press and hold the Select and the Play/Pause buttons until the Disk Mode screen appears.
steps.content: When the Apple logo appears, release the Menu and Select buttons and immediately press and hold the Select and the Play/Pause buttons until the Disk Mode screen appears.

steps.title: Connect the iPod to your computer; the screen on the iPod will change and say "Do not disconnect".
steps.content: Connect the iPod to your computer; the screen on the iPod will change and say "Do not disconnect".

steps.title: Before placing the iPod into disk mode you should verify that it has a charge.
steps.content: Before placing the iPod into disk mode you should verify that it has a charge.

steps.title: Toggle the Hold switch on and off.
steps.content: Toggle the Hold switch on and off. (Set it to Hold, then turn it off again.)

steps.title: Press and hold the Play/Pause and Menu buttons until the Apple/iPod logo appears, then release them.
steps.content: Press and hold the Play/Pause and Menu buttons until the Apple/iPod logo appears, then release them. This resets iPod. When you reset iPod all your music and data files are saved, but some customized settings may be lost.

steps.title: When the Apple logo appears, immediately press and hold the Previous and Next buttons until the Disk Mode screen appears.
steps.content: When the Apple logo appears, immediately press and hold the Previous and Next buttons until the Disk Mode screen appears.

steps.title: Connect the iPod to your computer; the screen on the iPod will change and say "Do not disconnect".
steps.content: Connect the iPod to your computer; the screen on the iPod will change and say "Do not disconnect".
